Package algorithms.imageProcessing.features

Class PatchUtil

java.lang.Object
algorithms.imageProcessing.features.PatchUtil
public class PatchUtil extends Object
carries the current integrated histogram from a region of HOGS, HCPT, or HGS data. Note that orientation is not used. Note that the user must restrict the arguments to being the same origin data.
Author:
nichole

    • intersection

      public double intersection(PatchUtil other)
      calculate the intersection of the histograms. histograms that are identical have a result of 1.0 and histograms that are completely different have a result of 0.
      Parameters:
      other -
      Returns:

    • diff

      public double[] diff(PatchUtil other)
      calculate the difference of the histograms. histograms that are identical have a result of 0.0 and histograms that are completely different have a result of 1.
      Parameters:
      other -
      Returns:
